synopsis.text:
Hina Satou, a young girl with an unusual sense of style and a claim to be an omniscient goddess, disrupts Youta Narukami's mundane summer vacation plans. Youta, a diligent high school student, had intended to spend his last summer break studying for his university entrance exams. However, Hina's unexpected arrival and her startlingly accurate predictions of future events force Youta to reconsider his disbelief in her divine powers.

Hina delivers an alarming revelation: the world will end in just 30 days. Despite her prophecy, she doesn't seem to have any plans to prevent the impending doom. Instead, she decides to move in with Youta, resulting in an unpredictable and lively summer for the pair. As they navigate through these strange circumstances together, they embark on a journey to create lasting memories before the world's end. Will they find a way to save the world, or will they simply cherish their remaining time together? Join Youta and Hina in this captivating anime series to find out.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
